83  return dependentVisible_;
84 }

86 bool VisualDependency::getShowIf() const{
87  return showIf_;
88 }
89 
90 void VisualDependency::evaluate(){
91  if((getDependeeState() && showIf_) || (!getDependeeState() && !showIf_)){
92  dependentVisible_ = true;
93  }
94  else{
95  dependentVisible_ = false;
96  }
97 }

159 bool StringVisualDependency::getDependeeState() const{
160  return find(values_.begin(), values_.end(),
161  getFirstDependeeValue<std::string>()) != values_.end();
162 }

164 std::string StringVisualDependency::getTypeAttributeValue() const{
165  return "StringVisualDependency";
166 }
167 
168 void StringVisualDependency::validateDep() const{
169  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(!getFirstDependee()->isType<std::string>(),
170  InvalidDependencyException,
171  "Ay no! The dependee of a "
172  "String Visual Dependency must be of type "
173  << TypeNameTraits<std::string>::name() << std::endl <<
174  "Type encountered: " << getFirstDependee()->getAny().typeName() <<
175  std::endl << std::endl);
176 }
177 
178 RCP<StringVisualDependency>
179  DummyObjectGetter<StringVisualDependency>::getDummyObject()
180 {
181  std::string blahString = "blah";
182  return rcp(new StringVisualDependency(
183  rcp(new ParameterEntry(blahString)),
184  DummyObjectGetter<ParameterEntry>::getDummyObject(),
185  "i'm a dummy"));
186 }

303  StringValidatorDependency::getDefaultValidator() const
304 {
305  return defaultValidator_;
306 }
307 
308 void StringValidatorDependency::evaluate(){
309  std::string currentDependeeValue = getFirstDependeeValue<std::string>();
310  for(
311  ParameterEntryList::iterator it = getDependents().begin();
312  it != getDependents().end();
313  ++it)
314  {
315  if(
316  valuesAndValidators_.find(currentDependeeValue)
317  ==
318  valuesAndValidators_.end())
319  {
320  (*it)->setValidator(defaultValidator_);
321  }
322  else{
323  (*it)->setValidator(valuesAndValidators_[currentDependeeValue]);
324  }
325  }
326 }
327 
328 std::string StringValidatorDependency::getTypeAttributeValue() const{
329  return "StringValidatorDependency";
330 }
331 
332 void StringValidatorDependency::validateDep() const{
333  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(!getFirstDependee()->isType<std::string>(),
334  InvalidDependencyException,
335  "Ay no! The dependee of a "
336  "String Validator Dependency must be of type " <<
337  TypeNameTraits<std::string>::name() << std::endl <<
338  "Type Encountered: " << getFirstDependee()->getAny().typeName() <<
339  std::endl << std::endl);
340 
341  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
342  valuesAndValidators_.size() < 1,
343  InvalidDependencyException,
344  "The valuesAndValidatord map for a string validator dependency must "
345  "have at least one entry!" << std::endl << std::endl);
346  ValueToValidatorMap::const_iterator it = valuesAndValidators_.begin();
347  RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> firstVali = (it->second);
348  ++it;
349  for(; it != valuesAndValidators_.end(); ++it){
350  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION( typeid(*firstVali) != typeid(*(it->second)),
351  InvalidDependencyException,
352  "Ay no! All of the validators in a StringValidatorDependency "
353  "must have the same type.");
354  }
355 }
356 
357 
358 RCP<StringValidatorDependency >
359  DummyObjectGetter<StringValidatorDependency>::getDummyObject()
360 {
361  std::string blahString = "blah";
362  StringValidatorDependency::ValueToValidatorMap dummyMap;
363  dummyMap.insert(StringValidatorDependency::ValueToValidatorPair("blah",
364  DummyObjectGetter<FileNameValidator>::getDummyObject()));
365  return rcp(new StringValidatorDependency(
366  rcp(new ParameterEntry(blahString)),
367  DummyObjectGetter<ParameterEntry>::getDummyObject(),
368  dummyMap));
369 }

371 BoolValidatorDependency::BoolValidatorDependency(
372  RCP<const ParameterEntry> dependee,
373  RCP<ParameterEntry> dependent,
374  RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> trueValidator,
375  RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> falseValidator):
376  ValidatorDependency(dependee, dependent),
377  trueValidator_(trueValidator),
378  falseValidator_(falseValidator)
379 {
380  validateDep();
381 }
382 
383 BoolValidatorDependency::BoolValidatorDependency(
384  RCP<const ParameterEntry> dependee,
385  Dependency::ParameterEntryList dependents,
386  RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> trueValidator,
387  RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> falseValidator):
388  ValidatorDependency(dependee, dependents),
389  trueValidator_(trueValidator),
390  falseValidator_(falseValidator)
391 {
392  validateDep();
393 }
394 
395 void BoolValidatorDependency::evaluate(){
396  bool dependeeValue = getFirstDependeeValue<bool>();
397  for(
398  ParameterEntryList::iterator it = getDependents().begin();
399  it != getDependents().end();
400  ++it)
401  {
402  dependeeValue ?
403  (*it)->setValidator(trueValidator_)
404  :
405  (*it)->setValidator(falseValidator_);
406  }
407 }
408 
409 RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator>
410  BoolValidatorDependency::getTrueValidator() const
411 {
412  return trueValidator_;
413 }
414 
415 RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator>
416  BoolValidatorDependency::getFalseValidator() const
417 {
418  return falseValidator_;
419 }
420 
421 std::string BoolValidatorDependency::getTypeAttributeValue() const{
422  return "BoolValidatorDependency";
423 }
424 
425 
426 void BoolValidatorDependency::validateDep() const{
427 
428  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(!getFirstDependee()->isType<bool>(),
429  InvalidDependencyException,
430  "Ay no! The dependee of a "
431  "Bool Validator Dependency must be of type " <<
432  TypeNameTraits<bool>::name() << std::endl <<
433  "Encountered type: " << getFirstDependee()->getAny().typeName() <<
434  std::endl << std::endl);
435 
436  if(!falseValidator_.is_null() && !trueValidator_.is_null()){
437  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(typeid(*falseValidator_) != typeid(*trueValidator_),
438  InvalidDependencyException,
439  "Ay no! The true and false validators of a Bool Validator Dependency "
440  "must be the same type! " <<std::endl << std::endl);
441  }
442 
443 }
444 
445 RCP<BoolValidatorDependency>
446  DummyObjectGetter<BoolValidatorDependency>::getDummyObject()
447 {
448  return rcp(new BoolValidatorDependency(
449  rcp(new ParameterEntry(true)),
450  DummyObjectGetter<ParameterEntry>::getDummyObject(),
451  null, null));
452 }
